alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Leon County through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Indian Head Acres, Andrew, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Bragg Stadium, Leon County Civic Center, North Florida Fairgrounds, Kleman Plaza, Innovation Park, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex and Mission San Luis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
